Description: You lash out at a creature with a quick fang attack. Make a melee attack roll, doing normal damage on a hit. Hyper Fang scores a critical hit on 19 and 20. If the natural attack roll is 18 or more, the target flinches.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
